channel.title: Chapter 7: Generative Pre-Trained Transformers on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 7: Generative Pre-Trained Transformers on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)

item.title: Chapter 7.1: GPT-1 (2018)
item.description: Here we introduce GPT-1 and how it uses the transformer decoder and task-specific input transformations to achieve its performance.

item.title: Chapter 7.2: GPT-2 (2019)
item.description: In this chapter we introduce GPT-2 as the next model and see how it acts as an universal task solver.

item.title: Chapter 7.3: GPT-3 (2020) & X-shot learning
item.description: In this chapter we introduce GPT-3 and its X-shot learning capabilities. We also introduce the concept of in-context learning.

item.title: Chapter 7.4: Tasks & Performance
item.description: GPT-3 has X-shot abilities. This chapters purpose is to illustrate GPT-3’s performance in various X-shot setting and to giev an overview on relevant tasks and benchmarks

item.title: Chapter 7.5: Discussion: Ethics and Cost
item.description: In this final chapter, we discuss ethical considerations and the cost of GPT-3.
